entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hope Slide
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:15 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High minus 2. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain changing to rain before morning. Snow level lowering to 600 metres before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. High 8. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High plus 5. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 7:35 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
